channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Weather Effect – Christmas Santa Snow Falling
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Weather Effect – Christmas Santa Snow Falling

item.title: CVE-2021-24709|2024-08-03T19:42:16.196Z -- unknown -- weather%20effect%20%E2%80%93%20christmas%20santa%20snow%20falling
item.description: The Weather Effect WordPress plugin before 1.3.6 does not properly validate and escape some of its settings (like *_size_leaf, *_flakes_leaf, *_speed) which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues

item.title: CVE-2021-24683|2024-08-03T19:42:16.085Z -- unknown -- weather%20effect%20%E2%80%93%20christmas%20santa%20snow%20falling
item.description: The Weather Effect WordPress plugin before 1.3.4 does not have any CSRF checks in place when saving its settings, and do not validate or escape them, which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
